job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongRolebrbrstrongThe Business Analytics teams mission is to enable a data driven business and generate knowledge from our data The team is responsible for providing data and insights on our business operations performance and associated processes as well as customers insights and products insights including both our vehicles and energy products portfolio The team directly supports business leaders up to our executive teambrbrWe are looking for a data scientist who can lead key crossfunctional projects for both energy and automotive business leveraging data science and ML technics to drive business process automations and support sales amp service strategies by leveraging our data Understanding of the broader automotive and energy markets is strongly valued in addition to engineering background with energy storage solutionsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Contribute on all the stages of data science projects from performing raw data mining to translating complex technical topics into business solutionslili Maintains and enhance a set of critical data models supporting our automotive and energy operationslili Maintains complex data pipeline supporting our teams mission in democratizing data and enabling a data driven organization partnering with our Sr Analystlili Effectively communicate actionable insights at all levels of the organizationlili Collaborate closely with leadership engineering and other stakeholders to improve our view of modeling and decision engineslili Solve complex problems using advanced mathematical modeling and optimization techniques including but not limited to big data preprocessing problem formulation features engineering algorithmic selection and evaluation hyperparameter tuning for machine learning and deploymentlili Build and Maintain a propensity model for Energy customers both solar and storage and build knowledge and metrics about Energy customers demographics and Energy product life cyclelili Define and better understand the synergy between Energy and Vehicle sales process and operationsbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli MS or equivalent experience in a quantitative or engineering field ie Statistics Computer Science Engineeringlili Proven track record of building models and extracting data insights in sales delivery and service domains Experience solving problems in any or all of the following spaces  forecasting predictive modeling NLP churn predictionlili Proficiency in Python SQL and experience with ML libraries and frameworks like Scikitlearn h2o or Spark MLlili Proficiency in one or more visualization tools like Tableau Bokeh RShiny etclili Experience engineering information out of massive complex and in some cases unstructured datasetslili Ability to apply a strong business sense with technical skills to effectively balance decisions around the complexity and speed of the project deliverylili Strong written verbal and interpersonal communication skills Ability to effectively communicate at all levels in the organizationlili Ability to selfstart and selfdirect work in an unstructured environment comfortable dealing with ambiguitylili Excellent problemframing problem solving and project management skills and ability to change direction quicklylili Ability to balance and prioritize multiple projectsbrliulstronguPreferredbrustrongulli Experience working within a Big Data environmentlili Experience with git and version control workflowsbrliul
